name: svelte-devtools
description: Browser devtools extension for debugging Svelte applications.

scripts.build:icon: for size in 16 24 48 96 128; do if [ ! -e dest/icon-$size.png -o src/svelte-logo.svg -nt dest/icon-$size.png ]; then svgexport src/svelte-logo.svg dest/icon-$size.png $size:; fi; done
scripts.dev: http-serve test/public -p 8940 & web-ext run -s dest -u http://127.0.0.1:8940 -u about:debugging && kill $!
